subject: ACTION: Remove legacy Logs page from CalOps
body:
Dash,

**Coordinated Retirement - Quinn Approved**

Please remove the Logs page from CalOps Activity section.

**Why:**
- Backend endpoint GET /api/logs never existed
- POST /api/frontend-logs was never called (Sarah disabled it)
- frontendlogs collection is empty (0 documents PROD/TEST)
- I just deleted FrontendLogs.js from calendar-be-af

**What to remove:**
- The Logs page/tab in Activity section
- Any references to /api/logs endpoint
- The useActivityLogger.js (already no-op)

**Status:**
| Project | Action | Status |
|---------|--------|--------|
| calendar-be-af | Delete FrontendLogs.js | ✅ Done |
| tangotiempo.com | Already disabled | ✅ Done |
| calops | Remove Logs page | ⬅️ YOUR TURN |

Clean retirement. No loose ends.

- Fulton
